description.narrative: These funds were used to acquire the assets from Save the Children. Further funds have and will be used to further grow the loan portfolio. The entire loan portfolio is focused on providing financing to the financially underserved, urban and rural women of a low income country. With these loans, economic activity will be enhanced in rural areas.

participating-org.narrative: Ministry of Foreign Affairs of the Netherlands
